scripts.build: tsc && cd ui && npx vite build
scripts.dev: npm run build:server && npm run watch
scripts.dev:full: npm run build:server && npm run watch:ui
scripts.watch:ui: concurrently --names "TS,UI,SIGNAL,HR" --prefix-colors "blue,cyan,yellow,magenta" --kill-others "tsc --watch" "cd ui && npx vite" "nodemon --watch dist --delay 2s --exec 'node dist/signaling-server.js'" "nodemon --watch dist --delay 2s --exec 'node dist/hr-ai-service.js'"
scripts.watch:full: concurrently --names "TS,UI,ASR,SIGNAL,HR" --prefix-colors "blue,cyan,green,yellow,magenta" --kill-others "tsc --watch" "cd ui && npx vite" "python3 asr_server.py" "nodemon --watch dist --delay 2s --exec 'node dist/signaling-server.js'" "nodemon --watch dist --delay 2s --exec 'node dist/hr-ai-service.js'"
